definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The basket held a heart shaped pillow to which Brad had secured our rings with pieces of wire.
sentences.chinese: 籃子裏有個雞心狀的墊枕，上面用金屬線固定住戒指。

sentences.english: I attached a wire to the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我在收音機上接了一根金屬線。

sentences.english: The paper also calculated the lifetime and accelerating coefficient of metal lines and thick-film resistors.
sentences.chinese: 文中還計算出的金屬線和厚膜電阻的壽命和加速係數。

sentences.english: Inside the plastic clip are pieces of metal that close a circuit when the jumper is in place.
sentences.chinese: 塑料夾套內部是金屬線，當跳線就位時可以閉合電路。

sentences.english: A new non-contact method for dynamic measuring the diameter of wire rod is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新的非接觸式動態測量金屬線材直徑方法。

sentences.english: The rope of the garden door was not strong enough, so he replaced it with wire.
sentences.chinese: 花園門的繩子不夠結實，於是他用金屬線代替它。

sentences.english: The metal wire diameter is different according to the size of the hexagon.
sentences.chinese: 使用的金屬線徑是根據六角形的大小而不同。

sentences.english: The metal can be made to thread or the shape of any necessaries.
sentences.chinese: 金屬能製成金屬線或任何需要的形狀。

sentences.english: Draw out the wire until it is very thin.
The electrician wound the wires off.
sentences.chinese: 這些金屬線中有一根鬆掉了。

sentences.english: For testing the tensile strength and flexure strength of wire.
sentences.chinese: 用於檢測金屬線材的抗拉強度，及彎曲試驗。

sentences.english: Electrical conductors are used to conduct electric current, as in the metal wires of an electric circuit.
sentences.chinese: 電導體用來導電，例如一個電路中的金屬線。

sentences.english: Princeville, Quebec, Canada for its aluminum metallizing wire.
sentences.chinese: 王子，加拿大魁北克省的鋁金屬線。

sentences.english: This kind of wire is easy to unbend.
sentences.chinese: 這種金屬線很容易弄直。

sentences.english: Avoid the use of wire rope and other metal wire absolute, prevent battery short circuit.
sentences.chinese: 絕對避免使用鋼繩等金屬線類，防止蓄電池短路。
